name: Accuform Mobile Safety Kit
description: A complete, portable OSHA compliance solution in a rugged case, ideal for mobile crews.
target_audience_match: Perfect for site supervisors constantly bouncing between sites and needing to prove compliance without hauling a whole cabinet.

name: SafetySmart Jobsite Compliance Kit
description: An all-in-one kit designed to meet general industry and construction OSHA standards.
target_audience_match: Ideal for foremen who just want one grab-and-go box that covers it all, rain or shine.

name: ComplianceSigns Portable Safety Center
description: Wall-mountable or freestanding station for compliance on temporary worksites.
target_audience_match: Great for teams running temporary or pop-up sites who need visibility and compliance at a glance.

name: North Safety Mobile First Response Kit
description: A mobile OSHA first aid and PPE bundle built for emergencies and inspections.
target_audience_match: Essential for leads who dread surprise inspections or worry about injury response on shifting job sites.

name: TuffKit Pro Contractor Safety Pack
description: Heavy-duty OSHA compliance kit made for high-mobility, high-risk industries.
target_audience_match: Built for crews always on the move — especially in dirty, wet, or high-traffic zones where gear takes a beating.
